name: konekt.market
description: Konekt is a communication protocol built on Solana that gives users a permanent on-chain phone number as their digital identity. Each number is minted as an NFT and becomes the userâ€™s key for private calls, encrypted messaging, wallet access, USDC transfers, and future pay-per-action features. Konekt focuses on user-owned identity, real peer-to-peer communication, and a secure privacy layer designed for the next generation of Web3 applications.
